reviews.title: Poorly run but has potential
reviews.text: We stayed here two nights in August 2008 to attend a wedding nearby. We felt we were inconveniencing the staff. Only one towel was provided for two people and upon asking for another towel, we were given the third degree. The shower head kept falling off its holder, and hit me in the head!! Ouch!! Breakfast was greasy and poorly cooked, but they have the right idea about what to serve.

reviews.title: Good Position near Thames Link Station.
reviews.text: The breakfast room is a lovely location to start your day. We ordered some drinks at the bar...well tried to. Seems they're not used to people drinking there because the service was appalling, and coasters were treated like gold offerings. The hotel is in a great location, walking distance to the town and train station. We would try somewhere else (eg. sopwell house) if in St Albans again.

My Partner and I stayed overnight. The bedroom was situated away from the main part of the Hotel but was no problem to get to. You are given your own keys to the main door, so no worries about getting back in the early hours.
